description: An inquiry is launched after soldiers discover elderly coronavirus victims "dead in their beds".
title: Coronavirus: Spanish army finds care home residents 'dead and abandoned'
title_page: Coronavirus: Spanish army finds care home residents 'dead and abandoned' - BBC News
maintext: But when the cause of death is suspected to be linked to coronavirus they are left in their beds until they can be retrieved by properly equipped funeral staff. In the capital Madrid, which has seen the highest number of cases and deaths, that could take up to 24 hours, officials said.
